term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - sedimentation in chemistry
term.title: sedimentation

item.text: Separation of a dispersed system under the action of a gravitational or centrifugal field according to the different densities of the components.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1825 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
